setting.location: Crossroads on main trade route, Spanish countryside
setting.weather: Hot sun, dust from road traffic

scene.mainElements: Knight blocking merchant caravan at crossroads, demanding they acknowledge something, merchants caught between amusement and irritation, squire trying to minimize damage, no text or letters visible
scene.details: Loaded pack mules with silk bundles, guards with hands on sword hilts, crossroads marked by old stone cross, dust clouds from stopped caravan, merchant ledgers in saddlebags, water gourds being passed, shade of single tree where roads meet, milestone showing distances, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Rolling hills with olive groves, distant town visible on hilltop, heat shimmer on road
scene.atmosphere: Collision of commerce and chivalry, practical world meeting impractical idealism, tension between humor and potential violence, social comedy of different classes interacting, no text or letters visible
